trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.

An object that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.

Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey"></xref>.

The accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuBar"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.

The collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.

The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText"></xref>.

The text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName"></xref>.
The name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , , or value; otherwise, `null`.

Hides all items that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> does not contain any items.

Displays all items that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> does not contain any items.

Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> can be moved.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> can be resized.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> can be resized; otherwise `false`.
Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> can be rotated.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
In all cases.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton"></xref> cannot be resized.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
In all cases.
